solver.search.solution

Class Solution

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.search.solution.Solution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ICause

    public class Solution
extends Object
implements ICause
    Class which stores the value of each variable in a solution
    Since:
    05/06/2013
    Author:
    Jean-Guillaume Fages, Charles Prud'homme
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Get the value of variable s in this solution
      boolean hasBeenFound() 
      void record(Solver solver)
      Records the current solution of the solver clears all previous recordings
      void restore()
      Set all variables to their respective value in the solution Throws an exception is this empties a domain (i.e. this domain does not contain the solution value)

      BEWARE: A restart might be required so that domains contain the solution values
      String toString()

      • record

        public void record(Solver solver)
        Records the current solution of the solver clears all previous recordings
        Parameters:
        solver -

      • restore

        public void restore()
             throws ContradictionException
        Set all variables to their respective value in the solution Throws an exception is this empties a domain (i.e. this domain does not contain the solution value)

        BEWARE: A restart might be required so that domains contain the solution values

        Throws:
        ContradictionException
